expo.name: Dynasty - The Family Social Media App

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Dynasty needs access to your camera to capture photos and videos for your family stories and events.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Dynasty needs access to your photo library to select photos and videos for your family stories and events.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Dynasty needs permission to save photos and videos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Dynasty needs access to your microphone to record audio messages and voice notes for your family stories.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Dynasty needs access to your contacts to help you find and invite family members to join your family tree.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Dynasty uses Face ID to securely authenticate you and protect your family's private content.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Dynasty needs your location to tag where family events and stories took place.

plugins.cameraPermission: Dynasty needs access to your camera to capture photos and videos for your family stories and events.
plugins.microphonePermission: Dynasty needs access to your microphone to record audio with videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Dynasty needs access to your photos to select media for stories and events.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Dynasty needs permission to save photos to your library.
